resources.string:
Release Date: December 25, 2023
Genre: Sci-Fi, Action
Rating: 7.5/10
Description: In a distant future, a band of rebels fights against oppressive forces on the moon.

Release Date: January 15, 2024
Genre: Drama
Rating: 8.2/10
Description: A young woman sets out on a journey to rescue her sister from bandits in the Wild West.

Release Date: March 10, 2024
Genre: Thriller
Rating: 8.9/10
Description: A gripping tale of survival as a group of migrants navigate through treacherous terrain and unforeseen dangers.

Release Date: February 5, 2024
Genre: Fantasy, Adventure
Rating: 7.8/10
Description: A magical adventure unfolds as a young boy discovers a mysterious wish-granting artifact.

Release Date: April 20, 2024
Genre: Mystery, Drama
Rating: 8.0/10
Description: An enigmatic beekeeper finds himself embroiled in a web of secrets and intrigue in a quaint countryside.

Release Date: May 15, 2024
Genre: Sci-Fi, Thriller
Rating: 8.5/10
Description: In a world where technology shapes reality, one creator challenges the limits of artificial intelligence.

Release Date: June 30, 2024
Genre: Action, Comedy
Rating: 7.6/10
Description: A team of skilled operatives embark on a mission filled with danger, deception, and unexpected humor.

Release Date: July 25, 2024
Genre: Action, Adventure
Rating: 7.9/10
Description: A lone drifter takes on a ruthless gang in a battle for justice and redemption on the open road.

Release Date: July 20, 2024
Genre: Action, Adventure
Rating: 7.9/10
Description: Join a group of elite agents as they navigate a high-stakes mission that blurs the lines between reality and simulation.

Release Date: October 10, 2024
Genre: Sci-Fi, Action
Rating: 8.5/10
Description: Witness the future of technology as humanity battles to control the power of advanced AI and cybernetic enhancements in a race against time.

Release Date: October 25, 2023
Genre: Mystery, Horror
Rating: 7.7/10
Description: Exhuma introduces audiences to a spine-chilling tale of paranormal occurrences that haunt a secluded mansion, sending shivers down the spine of all who dare to enter.

Release Date: November 12, 2023
Genre: Sci-Fi, Drama
Rating: 8.1/10
Description: IF explores the ethical dilemmas and moral complexities faced by pioneers in the field of artificial intelligence, questioning the very nature of humanity itself.
